Package Services

Class MapService

java.lang.Object
Services.MapService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MapService extends Object implements Serializable
The MapService class is used to load, read, parse, edit and the save map file.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Harsh Tank, Navjot Kamboj, Pranjalesh Ghansiyal, Yatish Chutani
See Also:

    • MapService

      public MapService()

  • Method Details

    • mapLoad

      public Map mapLoad(GameState p_gameState, String p_mapFileName) throws InvalidMap
      This method processes the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - this is the current state of the game
      p_mapFileName - this is the map file name
      Returns:
      Map object after processing the map file.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - shows that Map Validation has been failure

    • mapFile

      public List<String> mapFile(String p_mapFileName) throws InvalidMap
      This method loads and reads the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_mapFileName - Name of the map file
      Returns:
      All the lines in List from the map file.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - shows Map Validation has been failed

    • mapModify

      public void mapModify(GameState p_gameState, String p_editMapPath) throws IOException, InvalidMap
      The method is tasked with generating a new map in case the map to be edited does not exist. If the map already exists, it processes the map file into a game state object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current state of the game.
      p_editMapPath - contains the filepath.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - shows Map Validation has been failed
      IOException

    • mapSave

      public boolean mapSave(GameState p_gameState, String p_mapFileName) throws InvalidMap
      It processes the revised map into a .map file and saves it to the specified destination.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current gamestate
      p_mapFileName - file name in which map data is stored.
      Returns:
      true/false according to the success/failure of map save operation.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Invalid Map exception.

    • mapReset

      public void mapReset(GameState p_gameState, String p_loadFile)
      Resets Game State Map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - object of GameState.
      p_loadFile - File which couldn't be loaded

    • addOrRemoveContinents

      public Map addOrRemoveContinents(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeModified, String p_operationType, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Method to modify Map based on the operation type ( add/remove) and arguments
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_mapToBeModified - Map under modification
      p_operationType - Add/Remove operation
      p_argument - Arguments
      Returns:
      Map object with updated continents
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - exception

    • addOrRemoveCountry

      public Map addOrRemoveCountry(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeModified, String p_operationType, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Method to add/remove countries in the map
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_mapToBeModified - Map to be modified
      p_operationType - Add/Remove type operation
      p_argument - Arguments provided for the command operation
      Returns:
      Modified map object
      Throws:
      InvalidMap

    • addOrRemoveNeighbor

      public Map addOrRemoveNeighbor(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeModified, String p_operationType, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Method to add/remove neighbor on Map object
      Parameters:
      p_mapToBeModified - Map object to be modified
      p_operationType - Add/remove operation
      p_argument - Arguments provided for the command operation
      Returns:
      modified map object
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - exception

    • getFormatToSave

      public String getFormatToSave() throws IOException
      This method validates what format user wants to save the map file.
      Returns:
      String format of the map file
      Throws:
      IOException - exception while reading inputs from user

    • editFunctionality

      public void editFunctionality(GameState p_gameState, String p_argument, String p_operation, Integer p_switchParameter) throws IOException, InvalidMap, InvalidCommand
      Manages the Edit Operations: editcontinent, editcountry, editneighbor.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Object of the current Game State.
      p_argument - Arguments for the command operation.
      p_operation - Add or Remove operation to be performed.
      p_switchParameter - Type of Edit Operation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception.
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception.
      InvalidCommand - invalid command exception

    • setD_LogMapService

      public void setD_LogMapService(String p_MapServiceLog, GameState p_gameState)
      Setting up logs for map editor methods.
      Parameters:
      p_MapServiceLog - String containing log
      p_gameState - current gamestate instance
